short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quicklook the summary of openreview submission

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is unfriendly to get the submission information quickly, such as the ratings and the final accept/reject decision. This tool display such summary in a box, and you will never need to scroll all the page first before getting such information.
